tool_description: Evaluates product suitability by analyzing ingredients against hair type, scalp conditions, known sensitivities, and treatment goals.

hair_type_code.description: Hair type classification from Hair Type Classifier

scalp_sensitivity.description: Scalp sensitivity level: low, moderate, high, very_high

primary_goal.description: Main hair care goal: moisture, repair, growth, volume, color_protection, or curl_definition

budget_range.description: Budget category: budget, mid_range, or premium

error_messages: Empty ingredients list: At least one ingredient must be provided
Invalid hair type code: Must be a valid classification code from Hair Type Classifier
Invalid sensitivity level: Must be one of [low, moderate, high, very_high]
Invalid primary goal: Must be one of [moisture, repair, growth, volume, color_protection, curl_definition]
Invalid budget range: Must be one of [budget, mid_range, premium]
Ingredient format error: All ingredients must be non-empty text strings
usage: Provide product ingredients, hair type code, scalp sensitivity, and primary goal. Optionally specify known allergies, current treatments, and budget range. Returns compatibility assessment with safety warnings.

safety_rating.description: Safety assessment: safe, caution, or avoid

beneficial_ingredients.description: Ingredients that benefit this hair type
